import React from 'react' import {Image, Container } from 'react-bootstrap' import stories from '../data' import users from '../data' import communities from '../data' function StoryTitle() { console.log("dfh", users) return ( {stories.map(story => (

{story.title}

{story.author.name}
{story.community.name}

{story.created} | {story.readTime} Read {story.hashtags}

{story.content}

{story.author.name}

{story.created}

{story.community.name}

{story.content}

{story.author.name}

{story.created}

{story.community.name}

Amazing Authors To Follow

{story.author.name}

))} ) } export default StoryTitle
